authentication.details:
Firebase authentication is implemented using Firebase SDK in src/firebase.js
User login functionality using Firebase authentication is implemented with email and password.
User authentication is implemented using Firebase authentication for user signup and login.
User signup and login functionality implemented with form fields for email, password, and confirm password. Sign up button triggers account creation.
User authentication is implemented using Firebase authentication in userSlice.js

database.details:
Firestore database is used for storing and retrieving notes data.
Data persistence is implemented using Firebase Firestore in noteSlice.js
Firebase Firestore is used for database operations.

storage.details: Firebase Firestore is used for data storage.
